root.name: Rango: The Video Game
root.description: Overview Rango: The Video Game is an action-adventure platformer, inspired by the Paramount Pictures movie Rango. The game does not follow the plot or storyline of the movie, instead it continues the adventures of the main character, Rango, on from he movie. The game is set in the wild west town of Dirt, and includes some settings from the film as well as new, unseen locations. Spread across nine levels. players encounter a variety of gameplay segments that include third-person and side-scrolling platforming, third-person shooting, melee combat, mining, hunting collectibles, upgrading Rango and his moves via the in game currency, rail shooting and other elements.
